price: Eles terão castigo, na vida terrena. E, em verdade, o castigo da Derradeira Vida será mais árduo. E não terão, contra o castigo de Allah, Protetor.
arabic: لَّهُمۡ عَذَابٞ فِي ٱلۡحَيَوٰةِ ٱلدُّنۡيَاۖ وَلَعَذَابُ ٱلۡأٓخِرَةِ أَشَقُّۖ وَمَا لَهُم مِّنَ ٱللَّهِ مِن وَاقٖ

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: lahum ʿadhābun fī al-ḥayati al-dun'yā walaʿadhābu al-ākhirati ashaqqu wamā lahum mina al-lahi min wāqin
